title: DSNLU: Courses, Ranking, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Cutoff
meta_description: Damodaram Sanjivayya National Law University - [DSNLU], Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, BALLB {Hons.}, L.L.B, L.L.M . 6 Courses. Average Fees is 204000 per year.

basic_info.name: Damodaram Sanjivayya National Law University Courses
description: The university offers Integrated courses like BA LL.B. (Hons.) and LL.B. LL.M and PG courses like LL.M. and PG Diploma. For more information on the course read below:

basic_info.name: DSNLU Admission
description: The admission to the university is strictly based on the entrance exam that is CLAT. The application process varies for all the courses but it can be done online.

basic_info.name: DSNLU Cutoff
description: DSNLU CLAT 3rd provisional list has been released. Candidates can check the Cutoff in the table below:

basic_info.name: DSNLU Placement
description: The graduating batch of 2019 has a strength of 115, out of which only 80 students sat for the placement and 51 students accepted the job offers. Ethos Legal Alliance, Mumbai, has hired 6 students whereas 5 students accepted the job offer from Technosoft Solutions. The average salary package ranges from INR 3 - 4 LPA.

faqs.question: What all documents are required for foreign/ NRI for taking admission?
faqs.answer: Ans.The following documents are required-Copy of the Passport of the candidate/ Sponsor.School leaving Certificate/ College leaving Certificate.Migration Certificate.Statement of marks at the qualifying examination (Intermediate/ PUC/ HSC) and 10th standard.Copy of the statement of marks at the Qualifying Examination (equivalent to Intermediate/ PUC/ HSC) and percentage/ conversion certificate in the case of Grades.Copy of the Birth Certificate.Medical Certificate.Eight Stamp Sized Photographs of the Candidate.

faqs.question: What is the procedure for a scholarship?
faqs.answer: Ans.Damodaram Sanjivayya National Law University does not offer any scholarship but the Andhra Pradesh Government offers scholarships to the minority students and also Andhra Pradesh based scheduled caste and scheduled tribes’ students which is very beneficial.

faqs.question: What are the fee structure and total intake for B.A LLB?
faqs.answer: Ans.The fee structure for B.A. LLB is INR 1.78 LPA and a total of 138 seats are available for BA LLB Hons.

faqs.question: How are the faculty at the university?
faqs.answer: Ans.The faculty at the university consists of qualified Professors, Associate professors, Assistant professors, Lecturers, Teaching Associate, Teaching Assistant, and many other highly reputed visiting faculty. Most of them are Ph.D. holders as well.Read More:DSNLU Faculty

faqs.question: Is CLAT necessary for the admission in DSNLU?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the CLAT score is compulsory to take admission to the university otherwise you won’t be eligible to get considered for the admissions.

Section.name: About DSNLU
Section.description:
Damodaram Sanjivayya National Law University (DSNLU) was established in the year 2008 and is the 15th participating university in CLAT-2015. It offers courses such as B.A LLB, LLM, Ph.D. Admission to these courses is done on the basis of the entrance exam that is CLAT. The application process can be done online. The average salary package at the university ranges from INR 3 - 4 LPA.
Read More: DSNLU Cutoff
The university offers Integrated courses like BA LL.B. (Hons.) and LL.B. LL.M and PG courses like LL.M. and PG Diploma. For more information on the course read below:
Read More: DSNLU Fees
The admission to the university is strictly based on the entrance exam that is CLAT. The application process varies for all the courses but it can be done online.
Read More: DSNLU Admission
DSNLU CLAT 3rd provisional list has been released. Candidates can check the Cutoff in the table below:
The graduating batch of 2019 has a strength of 115, out of which only 80 students sat for the placement and 51 students accepted the job offers. Ethos Legal Alliance, Mumbai, has hired 6 students whereas 5 students accepted the job offer from Technosoft Solutions. The average salary package ranges from INR 3 - 4 LPA.
Read More: DSNLU Reviews
Ques. What all documents are required for foreign/ NRI for taking admission?
Ans. The following documents are required-
Ques. What is the procedure for a scholarship?
Ans. Damodaram Sanjivayya National Law University does not offer any scholarship but the Andhra Pradesh Government offers scholarships to the minority students and also Andhra Pradesh based scheduled caste and scheduled tribes’ students which is very beneficial.
Ques. What are the fee structure and total intake for B.A LLB?
Ans. The fee structure for B.A. LLB is INR 1.78 LPA and a total of 138 seats are available for BA LLB Hons.
Ques. How are the faculty at the university?
Ans. The faculty at the university consists of qualified Professors, Associate professors, Assistant professors, Lecturers, Teaching Associate, Teaching Assistant, and many other highly reputed visiting faculty. Most of them are Ph.D. holders as well.
Read More: DSNLU Faculty
Ques. Is CLAT necessary for the admission in DSNLU?
Ans. Yes, the CLAT score is compulsory to take admission to the university otherwise you won’t be eligible to get considered for the admissions.
